bibl.title: Invitation from Frank F. Law for the unveiling of Dean Cornwell's painting, Conquerors of Yellow Fever, June 2, 1941

div1.p: Law notes the unveiling and reception to introduce Cornwell's painting, “Conquerors of Yellow Fever”, and lists honorary guests.

div1.head: Invitation from Frank F. Law for the unveiling of Dean Cornwell's painting, Conquerors of Yellow Fever, June 2, 1941
div1.p:
Frank F. Law
cordially invites you to attend
the Unveiling of
Dean Cornwell's
new painting
“Conquerors of Yellow Fever”
Monday, June second
Nineteen Forty One
Twelve Noon
La Salle Moderne
The Statler Cleveland
Luncheon will be served
